newsitem.title: KYRGYZSTAN: Kyrgyz Jan-Apr trade gap narrows to $58.3 mln.
newsitem.headline: Kyrgyz Jan-Apr trade gap narrows to $58.3 mln.

text.p: Kyrgyzstan posted a trade deficit of $58.3 million in the first four months of this year after a $134.0 million deficit in the same period of 1996, the National Statistics Committee said on Tuesday
KYRGYZ MERCHANDISE TRADE Jan-Apr 97 Jan-Mar 97 Jan-Apr 96
